data.name: Eternal Dreamers - Anna, the Blood Driver
data.detailed_description:
Wake Anna from her slumber to make her powerful abilities your own! Consumed by a deep blood lust, Anna feeds on the life of your foes while replenishing her own.

*DLC characters can be recruited upon completion of the first quest.
data.about_the_game:
Wake Anna from her slumber to make her powerful abilities your own! Consumed by a deep blood lust, Anna feeds on the life of your foes while replenishing her own.

*DLC characters can be recruited upon completion of the first quest.
data.short_description: Wake Anna from her slumber to make her powerful abilities your own! Consumed by a deep blood lust, Anna feeds on the life of your foes while replenishing her own.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual-Core Processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Anything w/ OpenGL support
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
